author: AETerry
title: Jessie's Round-Up Review
review:
I'm basing this review off of my daughter's reaction to getting this on Christmas Morning.

 

It wasn't the first toy she immediately went for as there were other toys she wanted, but later in the day, she asked for help on opening this set and 5659 The Great Train Chase.

 

She was more interested in Bullseye and Jessie in this set then the actual blocks that come with it. Still a cute set and glad I got it for her.

 

It's Duplo, Lego. They're honest and dependable throughout the years.

 

If you're looking to get Bullseye, this is the set to get him from.

author: Rey_is_cool
title: Fun set you need to buy!
review: I got this set a while ago, when I was three, it was very fun.  I think if you are five or under or have a kid that is five or under you should get it for them. It was very fun and worth buying. It is of great quality.
